channel.title: thenga ennai on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in thenga ennai on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Headaches
item.description: This is a continuation of the series which started with Hair Care. The other posts covered Colds, Coughs and Foot problems. The information in this series is the knowledge of my grandmother, which I documented as part of a project on medicinal plants and home remedies.

item.title: Home Remedies from flora in south India: Hair Care
item.description: In my 12th grade, I did a project on the medicinal plants in my school campus with two of my classmates. As an add-on to that, we were asked to collect home remedies from people in our families.
